Title: Grants Rockland county residents who are charged the central business district toll a rebate
Summary: Grants Rockland county residents a rebate who are charged the central business district toll; establishes the "Rockland county central business district toll account".
LawCode: Amd ยง1270-a, add ยง1270-bb, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to granting Rockland county residents who are charged the central business district toll a rebate and to establish the Rockland county central business district toll transportation account
